attributes.action: Stop plastic straws in restaurants as it becomes harm to oceanic creatures
attributes.additional_details: People are saying that it is a one case scenario but if we don’t stop throwing plastic in the ocean this could effect even more turtles!
attributes.background: I am quite concerned as people are signing petitions to bring back plastic straws to fast food restaurants which I personally think is ignorant and cruel. I have seen one case of evidence in which a turtle has a straw wedged into its nostril and causes the turtle discomfort and pain.
